name: Orbiting Defense
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 47 Compo
Theme: Stuck in a loop

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/orbiting-defence

This is a quick game where you need to protect the planet from a meteor shower heading your way. You must use the satellites to destroy the meteors (each satellite can take 2 hits) and collect satellite parts to build more satellites. If all your satellites are destroyed or the planet is hit by 2 meteors, you will lose. The shower will last roughly 60 seconds, can you survive? 

Controls:
Move clockwise: Right Arrow
Move counter clockwise: Left Arrow
Move away from planet: Up Arrow
Move closer to planet: Down Arrow
Make Selection: Space or Enter
Full Screen: F
Mute: M
Return to Menu: Q

*You must return to the planet and have enough satellite parts for new ones to spawn.
